function.name: get_all_products
function.description: Get all products from the database

limit.description: Maximum number of products to return, default is 100

function.name: get_product
function.description: Get a specific product by its ID

product_id.description: The product ID, for example p001

function.name: search_products_by_name
function.description: Search products by name with case-insensitive partial match

function.name: search_products_by_brand
function.description: Search products by brand with case-insensitive match

brand.description: Brand name to search for (e.g., Apple, Samsung, Sony, Dell)

function.name: search_products_by_category
function.description: Search products by category with case-insensitive match

category.description: Product category to search for (e.g., Phone, Laptop, Tablet, Headphones)

function.name: get_all_users
function.description: Get all users in the system

function.name: get_user
function.description: Get a specific user by their ID

user_id.description: The user ID, for example u001

function.name: search_users_by_name
function.description: Search users by name with case-insensitive partial match

function.name: search_users_by_email
function.description: Search users by email address with case-insensitive match

email.description: User email address to search for (e.g., john@example.com)

function.name: get_all_orders
function.description: Get all orders in the system

function.name: get_user_orders
function.description: Get all orders for a specific user by their ID or name - can search directly by user name without needing to find their ID first

user_id.description: The user ID (e.g., u001) - use this if you already know the user ID

user_name.description: The user name (e.g., Bob Wang, John Smith) - use this to search for and get orders for a user by their name

function.name: get_inventory
function.description: Get all inventory or filter by low stock threshold

threshold.description: Stock level threshold to filter low stock products (optional, default shows all)

function.name: get_product_inventory
function.description: Get detailed inventory information for a specific product by ID or name

product_name.description: The product name (e.g., iPad Air) - used if product_id is not provided

function.name: get_low_stock_products
function.description: Get all products with stock level below a specified threshold

threshold.description: Stock threshold for identifying low stock products (default: 20)
